bug.short_desc: Newer version of upstream chirp is available - support for BaoFeng UV-5X3 and UV-50X3 (new models)
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: BaoFeng released the UV-5X3 and UV-50X3 recently. Support was added in chirp five days ago (08/17/2016) for the prior, one month ago (07/12/2016) for the latter:
http://chirp.danplanet.com/issues/3931 http://chirp.danplanet.com/issues/3815
It looks like daily builds after 08/18/2016 should support these two new radios:
http://chirp.danplanet.com/projects/chirp/repository/revisions
If possible, could you please update the package to utilize an updated daily source in order to add this support? Thank you.
chirp-20160819-1.fc23 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 23. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-c357b316de
chirp-20160819-1.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-9054275892
chirp-20160819-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-0326927a4f

chirp-20160819-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-0326927a4f
